  • business administration

Business administration

This Business Administration program provides the student with a balanced background in business plus the opportunity for career specialization. The student completes the core requirements and can choose either a specific area of concentration in one of the five areas listed or can plan an individualized course of study to meet specific career needs by completing 25 credits of advisor-approved electives.

Non-Transfer Associate Degrees

  • Business (AAAS)
  • Entrepreneurship (AAAS)
  • Fashion merchandising (AAAS)
  • General business administration (AAAS)
  • Marketing (AAAS)
  • Retail management (AAAS)
  • Sports & event marketing (AAAS)

Certificates

  • Social media marketing (CC)
  • International trade (ST)
  • Project management (ST)
  • Sustainable business leadership (ST)
